price: See how they call you names[42]! Thus they have gone astray and cannot find a way.
arabic: ٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ ضَرَبُواْ لَكَ ٱلۡأَمۡثَالَ فَضَلُّواْ فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ سَبِيلٗا
footnotes: [42] i.e., a poet, a madman, bewitched, etc.
